Text.Page:
We need to move forward. Take the fight to the Hatchery and hunt {@LinkCreature:39#170#loyal jalmaraks}, and {@LinkCreature:39#190#ferocious} and {@LinkCreature:39#191#brutal maligoses} in Arachnaea.

Report to Anwold at the Sanctuary when you're finished.

If everyone who came here worked as hard as you, we wouldn't have these problems.

I'm frankly surprised you haven't gone a bit mad.

As you encounter {@LinkCreature:39#170#loyal jalmaraks}, {@LinkCreature:39#190#ferocious maligoses}, or {@LinkCreature:39#191#brutal maligoses} in your travels through Arachnaea, kill them. You can bring me the proof of their deaths anytime for a reward.
